Creation or modification of LNK files wi.Data: Windows Event ID 4663, Windows Event ID 4688
Creation or modification of LNK files wi.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4663 for .lnk file creations or modifications. Extract the 'TargetFilename' and 'ObjectName' (for the LNK file). Analyze the contents/properties of newly created/modified LNK files for unusual 'IconEnvironmentDataBlock' or 'Target Path' values (e.g., containing URLs, suspicious commands, encoded data). Use entropy analysis on suspicious LNK content if possible, though LNK structures are specific. Focus on string matching for known bad patterns or suspicious file paths/URLs.

Outbound network connections initiated b.Data: Zeek conn.log, Zeek http.log, Windows Event ID 4688
Outbound network connections initiated b.Action: Monitor Zeek conn.log and http.log for outbound connections originating from processes commonly associated with LNK execution (e.g., explorer.exe, cmd.exe if called by LNK). Correlate network events with Windows Event ID 4688 Process Creation logs to identify the parent process. Filter connections based on destination (external IPs/domains, especially untrusted). Use correlation analysis to link suspicious network activity back to LNK file access events (e.g., Windows Event ID 4663).
